div.expr:style: "background-image: url(\"" + data:sourceUrl + "\"); " + "background-position: " + data:backgroundPositionStyleStr + "; " + data:widthStyleStr + "min-height: " + data:height + "_height: " + data:height + "background-repeat: no-repeat; "

b:if.cond: data:blog.pageType not in {"static_page","item","error_page"} and data:blog.url != data:blog.homepageUrl

div.expr:class: data:blog.pageType not in {"item","static_page"} ? "blog-posts hfeed row" : "blog-posts hfeed"

b:if.script: function getRelatedLabel() { var relatedLabel = ""; return relatedLabel; }function getCurrentUrl() { var url = ""; return url; }

div.p:
Please choose a checkout option.
No personal data required.

div.label: Message
div.span: Please include messages to us here.

div.label: Reasons for Returns
div.div: Please write details for item returns.

Sending detail returns information will help us solve your returns swiftly and accurately.
Our support team will contact you for further actions. Please retain item packaging, receipts or any proof of purchase.
All fields are required. Thank you.

div.class: post hentry uncustomized-post-template simpleCart_shelfItem index-page col-xs-6 col-sm-6 col-md-3
footer footer-logo col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-md-2 col-md-pull-10
